Check the texts and document IDs

Source: R/utils.R
check_texts_and_ids.Rd

Validates if the given texts and document IDs are not NULL or empty.

Usage

check_texts_and_ids(texts, doc_ids)

Arguments

texts

List. A list of texts.

doc_ids

List. A list of document IDs.

On this page
